clean_data: Network Administrator span lNetworkspan span lAdministratorspan Network Administrator Becket Lee LLP Douglassville PA Network Administrator with 10 years of IT experience seeking a position that will expand and strengthen my skills as an IT Professional Authorized to work in the US for any employer Work Experience Network Administrator Becket Lee LLP Malvern PA September 2012 to Present Perform daily network health and security checks including antivirus definitions critical server disk space intrusion detection reports VPN authentication logs and Windows system event logs Rackmount configure and install the OS on new servers as older systems are decommissioned Continuously update VMware server templates to improve server hardening including addressing newly discovered vulnerabilities in a timely manner and updating to the latest Microsoft patches to aid in maintaining our PCI DSS compliance certification Primary contact for maintaining current VMs and deploying new VMs in the VMware environment Participate in annual disaster recovery test bringing critical network functionality up at a secondary location within 24 hours and imaging 20 workstations for user testing Setup new user accounts in Active Directory and create Microsoft Exchange and Lync accounts Deploy workstation images and software using Microsoft SCCM Recently tasked with choosing hardware specifications for several new workstation configurations as part of the coming migration to Windows 10 Continue to perform Help Desk duties as needed Help Desk Technician Becket Lee LLP Malvern PA September 2008 to September 2012 Performed diagnostics maintenance and repair on Dell computers HP laser printers and other hardware devices Took support calls for users in the business regarding hardware and software assistance Maintained a database to keep track of all hardware and software assets within the company Worked with the tech team to image configure and deploy brand new Windows 7 workstations to replace all Windows XP systems in the company Education Associate in Specialized Technology in Internet Network Engineering Berks Technical Institute Wyomissing PA 2008 Skills ACTIVE DIRECTORY CISCO VMWARE VIRTUAL SERVER VISIO Customer Service Networking Windows Technical Support Microsoft Office Windows 7 Windows 8 Windows 10 Windows Server CertificationsLicenses CompTIA A Present Microsoft Certified Technology Specialist MCTS Present Microsoft Certified Professional MCP Present Additional Information SUMMARY OF SKILLS Experienced with Windows Server 2008 2012 2016 Windows 7 8 and 10 Experience installing configuring and managing Windows Active Directory and Group Policy Fundamental understanding of Cisco network device management Experience managing HyperV and VMware virtual server environments Proficient with all Microsoft Office software including Lync and Visio as well as Adobe Acrobat Photoshop and Premiere Experience in building and troubleshooting PCs Experience in troubleshooting and repairing HP Laserjet Printers RELATED SKILLS Configuring Managing and Maintaining Windows Server 2008 Servers Training September 2012 Administering System Center 2012 Configuration Manager Training January 2016 Automating Administration with Windows PowerShell Training November 2018
